thread.title: Reported gunman on loose in Mt Victoria, Wellington
thread.title_full: Reported gunman on loose in Mt Victoria, Wellington

title: Reported gunman on loose in Mt Victoria, Wellington
text:
Reported gunman on loose in Mt Victoria, Wellington Last updated 14:02, February 2 2017 John Nicholson 
Mount Victoria from behind Wellington East Girls' College. 
Armed police are hunting for a person spotted with a gun near the top of Mt Victoria, Wellington. 
Wellington East Girls' College is in lockdown - and has called on caregivers and parents to stay away from the school. 
Police confirmed armed officers were in the area of Lookout Rd, at the top of the hill overlooking central Wellington. FAIRFAX NZ 
Armed police are looking for a man with a gun. 
Police were called to the scene at 12.38pm on Thursday. 
The man spotted with the gun had not been found. 
The college, having its orientation day, said on its website: "We have been informed by police that there has been a possible sighting of a man with a firearm in Mt Victoria. The police have advised us to initiate our lock down protocol. 
"Caregivers are advised to stay away from the school until further notice. We will communicate further information as we are advised by police. 
"Staff please stay in classrooms/buildings with students as per protocol." 
More soon.
